summary: Successfully tested backup history and reminder features. All new backup endpoints working correctly with proper UI integration

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Previously had MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue - FIXED
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Fixed by ensuring clean dictionary return without _id field

ui_bugs.issue: Click intercepted by overlay, requires force=True

passed_tests: Creating backup adds entry to history with correct counts
Frontend history panel displays on the right side
History shows proper date/time format and 'Hace X minutos/días'
History shows count of elements in 'loc • vag • dec • son' format
Reminder settings toggle switch works correctly
Settings save with success message confirmation
Clear history confirmation dialog and functionality
